data.name: Crumbling City
data.detailed_description:
This is a VR physics destruction game made by a small indie team in the Unity game engine.

You are a dinosaur trying to take back and restore your natural habitat that has been destroyed by humanity.
Your goal is to destroy everything they have built in your former territory.

With your big dino claws you can crumble huge skyscrapers within SECONDS!
If that's not enough for you, we've added supernatural weapons and special abilities to make destruction way faster.
Your arsenal is split up into 4 different classes based on the natural elements: EARTH - AIR - WATER - FIRE.
And to make your battle even CRAZIER, there are lots of boosters, these will temporarily increase your health, speed, armor, etc..

But it's not as easy as it seems!
You have to hurry and be careful because waves of enemies (with big guns) chase you around the city to prevent you from destroying their home.

(If you don't own a VR headset and would still like to play this game there's also support for keyboard and mouse gaming.)
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: In Crumbling City you are a giant dinosaur taking back your natural habitat that is destroyed by humanity. Procedurally generated environments can be completely destroyed, but since destroying cities with your bare hands is quite difficult, there are various weapons, abilities and boosters.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: linux 5.10.7
  • Processor: Quad Core+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
